divs: Sighting DetailsWent to the bathroom and noticed a bright pure white light where there has never been one in 16 years living here. I watched it and it sped back and forth and then started to oscillate and dim and brighten. Then it looked like an hour glass shaped light and moved back and forth and up and down in a jumpy motion. This was the event of the 6th and it was north easterly. After about 25 minutes it just totally disappeared. This happen 6 and 7 march 06. the 7th it was in the north westerly and did a simliliar routine but it was at 10:30 pm and moved quite a distance in seconds then stopped and oscillated and jerked up and down and back and forth side to side. I am retired from the Air Force, Air Force Space Command 23SOPS ( 23rd Space Operations Squadron ) and this is a second sighting for me in 10 years having another in the mid 90,s that was mind opening.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: rapid moving then stopping and oscillating
trends: There have been no other sightings in Deering
This sighting has never been favorited.
